name: MSStickerBrowserView
desc: A browser view that displays a dynamically generated list of stickers.

items.name: init(frame: CGRect)
items.desc: Creates a new sticker browser containing medium-sized stickers.

items.name: init(frame: CGRect, stickerSize: MSStickerSize)
items.desc: Creates a new sticker browser containing stickers of the specified size.

items.name: protocol MSStickerBrowserViewDataSource
items.desc: The protocol for dynamically providing stickers to a browser view.

items.name: func reloadData()
items.desc: Asks the sticker browser to reload its data from the data source.

items.name: var contentInset: UIEdgeInsets
items.desc: The distance that the content is inset from the edge of the browser view.

items.name: var contentOffset: CGPoint
items.desc: The distance that the content is offset from the browser’s origin.

items.name: func setContentOffset(CGPoint, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Sets the offset distance between the content and the browser’s origin.

items.name: var stickerSize: MSStickerSize
items.desc: The size of the stickers in the browser.

items.name: enum MSStickerSize
items.desc: The size of the stickers in the browser view.
